= fugitive =

== Add current file ==
:Gwrite
:Gw

== Blame for changes on current file ==
:Gblame

== Commit added changes ==
:Gcommit

== Delete the current file and the corresponding Vim buffer ==
:Gremove

== Diff on current file ==
:Gdiff

== Pull ==
:Gpull <parameters>

== Push ==
:Gpush <parameters>

== Rename the current file and the corresponding Vim buffer ==
:Gmove

== Revert current file to last checked in version ==
:Gread
